name: The Daily Grind (Ashe)
description:
Experience a window into the life of a barista, preparing coffee step-by-step while dealing with customers.

Game is roughly five minutes long, done as a Games Design student project in third year. Please enjoy the experience!

CREDITS

Emilee Goulding [Me]- Concept, illustration, design and voice [https://emileegoulding.artstation.com/]

Alison Huang- Programming, design and voice [https://drazillion.wordpress.com/]

Alan Robinson- Voice [https://www.artstation.com/alanrobinson]

Ethan Perkins- Voice
